title: INFO: URW Grotesk
content:
Hi all.   
   
Looking for background info & history on URW Grotesk. Anyone familiar with this face?   
   
Not much available on myfonts.com or off the URW++ site.   
   
All I've found is that it was designed by Herman Zapf in the 80s.   
   
Any additional info would be much appreciated!
author: anonymous
